HostingBox is a newly launched brand. HostingBox specializes in Shared, Reseller, VPS, and Dedicated Hosting. Our goal is to offer high quality products at a low end cost.
     
**Resource Bundles (OpenVZ)**  
    
   * 3GB RAM   
   * 100 GB Storage  
   * 2TB Bandwidth  
   * 4 vCores  
   * 3 IPv4  
    
$7/Month or $18/Quarter   
**[Order Now](https://hostingbox.us/manage/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=92)**   
     
**Location:**
This offer is located in Dallas, Texas at the Psychz Datacenter and includes 20Gbps DDoS Protection.

PayPal
